name: Among Clickteam
description:
This game was made in less then a day for fun. Its a knockoff- spinoff version of the popular Innersloth inc. game "Among us" 

Read the readme file included PASSWORDCREATORORIGINAL GAMEhektorgamingHektor Gaming on youtube"Among us" by innersloth

The game was made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5+  Developer.

If you are gonna make a video, or link , post or just any sharing around please read the readme file included with the zip file and use neither my youtube link or itch.io link. DO NOT MAKE A LINK ON YOUR OWN

Your antivirus may go off however there is nothing i can do since its beacuse the app was made only today and it has no offical copy right holder.

and i cant copyright it beacuse... its a spinoff version of amongus

Watch my video for proof that after 30 seconds of scanning the antivirus will say it has no hidden threats
